title: Strengthening Practical Teaching Competencies: Interdisciplinary Experiential Learning Through Animals: Mathematical Reasoning and Ethical

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistics and foundational biology concepts
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Enhance statistical modeling and predictive capabilities based on animal behavior pattern data.
Cultivate the ability to analyze animal-related issues from ethical and societal perspectives through an interdisciplinary approach.
Experience the process of visualizing and interpreting animal data collected through experiential learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
